content:
### **🔥 Best Move Right Now: Connecting with AI Thought Leaders**  

✅ **Yes, sending connection requests to AI leaders is the highest-impact move before MVP.**  
✅ **Yes, attach your Sales Navigator list so I can review it first.**  

---

### **🔹 Why This Matters Now**  
- The **right AI experts seeing your post = credibility boost + high-value engagement.**  
- Even if they don’t accept immediately, **it puts you on their radar.**  
- Some will **check out your profile & post**—which can drive engagement.  

---

### **🔹 Next Steps**
📌 **1️⃣ Attach your Sales Nav list here for review.**  
📌 **2️⃣ I’ll refine the list & prioritize the best AI experts to target first.**  
📌 **3️⃣ We’ll craft a short, high-impact connection request message that maximizes acceptance rates.**  

🚀 **Let’s do this now—this could unlock major opportunities.**
